title: New Construction Service Request
description: A building contractor needs to arrange for new electric and water service connections for a home under construction.

tasks.description: Collect the project details, including the address, site plans, and required service capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary information and documentation from the contractor.

tasks.description: Create a new project in the engineering department's work management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a new construction project ticket.

tasks.description: Explain the process, timeline, and any fees or contributions-in-aid-of-construction required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly outlines the next steps and costs for the contractor.
